argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | srngcl.i | |- .* = ( *r ` R ) |
| 2 |  | srngcl.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( *rf ` R ) = ( *rf ` R ) |
| 4 | 2, 1, 3 | #P_stafval | |- ( X e. B -> ( ( *rf ` R ) ` X ) = ( .* ` X ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( R e. *Ring /\ X e. B ) -> ( ( *rf ` R ) ` X ) = ( .* ` X ) ) |
| 6 | 3, 2 | #P_srngf1o | |- ( R e. *Ring -> ( *rf ` R ) : B -1-1-onto-> B ) |
| 7 |  | #P_f1of | |- ( ( *rf ` R ) : B -1-1-onto-> B -> ( *rf ` R ) : B --> B ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( R e. *Ring -> ( *rf ` R ) : B --> B ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_ffvelrnda | |- ( ( R e. *Ring /\ X e. B ) -> ( ( *rf ` R ) ` X ) e. B ) |
| 10 | 5, 9 | #P_eqeltrrd | |- ( ( R e. *Ring /\ X e. B ) -> ( .* ` X ) e. B ) |
